January 2024.title: New Year Speedcubing Challenge
January 2024.summary: Kick off the year with a speedcubing competition
January 2024.description:
Our first event of the year brought together cubers of all skill levels to compete in various categories. Participants challenged themselves with 3x3, 4x4, and blindfolded solving.

The event was a great success with over 50 participants and several new records set by our club members.

January 2024.title: Workshop: Advanced F2L Techniques
January 2024.summary: Learn advanced First Two Layers techniques
January 2024.description:
This workshop focused on improving participants' F2L (First Two Layers) techniques, which is crucial for sub-20 second solves.

Our senior members demonstrated various approaches and provided personalized feedback to attendees.

February 2024.title: Valentine's Day Team Solve
February 2024.summary: Partner cubing event for Valentine's Day
February 2024.description: A special team-based solving event where pairs worked together to solve cubes with one hand each. The event was both challenging and fun, with prizes for the fastest teams.

March 2024.title: Spring Cube-a-Thon
March 2024.description: Our annual marathon event featured non-stop cubing activities from morning to evening, including relays, team solves, and novelty events like "feet only" solving.

March 2024.title: Beginner's Workshop
March 2024.summary: Introduction to speedcubing for new members
March 2024.description: This workshop introduced new members to the basics of speedcubing, covering notation, beginner's method, and practice techniques.

April 2024.title: April Fools' Cube Modding
April 2024.description: A light-hearted event where members created and attempted to solve modified cubes, including stickerless cubes with identical colors on opposite sides.

May 2024.title: Pre-Summer Championship
May 2024.summary: Competition to crown our pre-summer champions
May 2024.description: The last major competition before summer break, with categories for all WCA events. Winners received special trophies designed by our art club.

May 2024.title: Cube Donation Drive
May 2024.description: Members donated cubes to be distributed to local schools to help spread cubing enthusiasm. We collected over 100 cubes!

May 2024.title: Pre-Summer Championship
May 2024.summary: Competition to crown our pre-summer champions
May 2024.description: The last major competition before summer break, with categories for all WCA events. Winners received special trophies designed by our art club.

January 2025.title: Winter Cube Relay Championship
January 2025.summary: Team-based speedcubing competition in winter theme
January 2025.description: Teams of four compete in a relay format where each member must complete their cube before passing to the next teammate. Winter-themed cubes will be provided for the final round.

January 2025.title: Blindfold Solving Workshop
January 2025.summary: Master the art of solving cubes without looking
January 2025.description: Learn advanced memorization techniques and solving methods for blindfold cubing. Suitable for intermediate cubers looking to challenge themselves.

January 2025.title: MegaMinx Marathon
January 2025.summary: All-day event focused on the 12-sided puzzle
January 2025.description: Special competition and practice sessions dedicated to the Megaminx puzzle, with categories for beginners and advanced solvers.

January 2025.title: Cube Customization Day
January 2025.description: Bring your old cubes and learn how to modify them for better performance or unique appearances. Lubrication, spring adjustments, and sticker customization stations available.

January 2025.title: Speedcubing Tournament: Frozen Edition
January 2025.description: Unique tournament where competitors must first chill their hands in ice water before each solve. Tests both speed and ability to perform under adverse conditions.
